content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'EmployeePIIData' AND TYPE = 'U')
CREATE TABLE dbo.EmployeePIIData
	(
	 Id int,
	 FirstName nvarchar(30),
	 LastName nvarchar(30),
	 Company nvarchar(30),
	 Address nvarchar(30),
	 City nvarchar(30),
	 County nvarchar(30),
	 State nvarchar(10),
	 Phone nvarchar(30),
	 email nvarchar(50),
	 SSN nvarchar(30)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹                 
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_EmployeePIIData
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO dbo.EmployeePIIData
(Id 1, FirstName 2, LastName 3, Company 4, Address 5, City 6, County 7, State 8, Phone 9, email 10, SSN 11)
FROM 'https://azuresynapsesa.dfs.core.windows.net/rawdata/CustomerPIISampleData/CustomerPIIData20K.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,FIELDQUOTE = '"'
	,FIELDTERMINATOR = ','
	,FIRSTROW = 2
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://azuresynapsesa.dfs.core.windows.net/rawdata/'
	,IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM EmployeePIIData
GO
